resources.string:
Hi, my name is Fatin. 

I love to do Taekwondo since secondary school. 

Taekwondo is a Korean form of martial arts, characterized by punching and kicking techniques, with emphasis on head-height kicks, jumping spinning kicks, and fast kicking techniques. 
Fun fact is that my little sister and little brother also do Taekwondo and they already got their black belts. 

I like Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, too. Muay Thai. Judo. Aikido. Mixed martial arts - not so much. 
And sometimes I want to learn and do all of them when I got free time. 
And even sometimes, I actually take part in the Taekwondo competition for open category. 

Once, I was forced to stop Taekwondo temporarily because my SPM was around the corner and I was quite gloomy. 

I\hope I can come back stronger and will be able to get my black belt. 
You should ask someone else about Taekwondo, though.
